org.spf4j.failsafe.concurrent

Class FailSafeExecutorImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.spf4j.failsafe.concurrent.FailSafeExecutorImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable, FailSafeExecutor

    public final class FailSafeExecutorImpl
extends Object
implements FailSafeExecutor
    Executor that will call Callables with retry. This executor cannot be used inside a Completion service.
    Author:
    zoly
